name: Cattie
description:
Cattie is a retro and challenging platform game where you control the lovely kitten Cattie through a series of challenging levels. With each level, the difficulty steadily increases, introducing new mechanics and enemies that will put your platforming skills to the test.

Cattie's Abilities:
Running, jumping, wall jumping, attacking, and crouching



⮞ 100 Levels
⮞ 100 Achievements
⮞ 8-Bit Music
